document.full_text: indian security agencies are not satisfied with a plan offered by research in motion for them to have access to data on its blackberry messenger services, junior telecoms minister sachin pilot told parliament on wednesday.
document.title: india says rim's messenger remedy not satisfactory
lines_and_colors: indian security agencies are not satisfied with a plan offered by research in motion for them to have access to data on its blackberry messenger services, junior telecoms minister sachin pilot told parliament on wednesday.
